name: 蔡一豪
objective: This course aims to introduce the basic concepts and applications of environmental engineering, covering key areas such as atmospheric change and air pollution control, water resource management, water pollution and its prevention, solid waste management, hazardous and radioactive waste treatment, noise pollution control, soil resource management, energy utilization, ecological environment conservation, and environmental impact assessment. Through systematic learning, students will acquire the ability to solve real-world environmental problems and understand the principles and technologies of environmental protection.
